attributes.action: Abort plans to destroy Bristol Hip, next to Castle Park, Bristol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that there are plans to have the famous "Bristol Hip" removed and destroyed. As of yet, planning permission has not been granted. Bristol hip is a concrete structure consisting of two flat banks at a 90 degree angle from one another with a rail on top. It doesn't sound like much, but infact this spot is one of the UK's most respected and well known for bmxing, rollerblading and skateboarding. It would be a crying shame to have the "Bristol Hip" removed forever.
